camera_set_view_angle: You can use this function to update the angle of the view camera within the room. You give the unique camera ID value (as returned by the different camera_create() functions) and then give the angle that you wish to set the camera view to. The default value is 0° with positive values rotating the camera counter-clockwise, ie: setting the value to 90 will rotate the camera 90° to the left.
